description:
Lisa warned Peter that other nations would soon proposition him. Waking up and finding an elf in his bed proves she was right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peter Grill and Relationships with Elves
Peter Grill e a Relação com as Duendes
Peter Grill et sa relation avec l`elfe
Peter Grill to Elf no Kankei
Peter Grill und die Beziehung mit der Elfe
ピーター・グリルとエルフの関係
